## Data

```{r}
set.seed(3475934)

shape <- 10
scale <- 2
rate <- 1 / scale

n <- 1e3

y <- rgamma(n, shape = shape, scale = scale)
```

$$\bar{y} = shape \cdot scale$$

```{r}
shape * scale
mean(y)
```

$$Var(y) = shape \cdot scale ^ 2$$

$$s = \sqrt{shape \cdot scale ^ 2}$$

```{r}
shape * scale^2
var(y)

sqrt(shape * scale^2)
sd(y)
```

## brms model

```{r}
fm <- brm(y ~ 1, family = Gamma,
          data = list(y = y),
          backend = "cmdstan")
```

```{r}
prior_summary(fm)
```


```{r}
post <- as_draws_df(fm)

```
